Paragraph: As can be seen in Figure 5 , blend films based on PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT with PC71BM showed unexpected phase separation , with corresponding domain size over 200 and 100 nm , respectively which are much larger than typical exciton diffusion length of ca.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| Blend films based on PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT with PC71BM |
| Unexpected phase separation |
| Corresponding domain size (for PIDT - EHNT: over 200 nm, for PIDT - DTNT: over 100 nm) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| Corresponding domain size for PIDT - EHNT (over 200 nm) |
| Corresponding domain size for PIDT - DTNT (over 100 nm) |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material properties. "Blend films based on PIDT - EHNT and PIDT - DTNT with PC71BM" is a compound or mixture, "unexpected phase separation" is a phenomenon, and "Figure 5" is a visual representation.
